text:
no not really, you can however see how many times a link that was shared was clicked. You have to used a tracked link though.

You can fake this interaction with javascript tools like sharre.js which whenever someone shares through your share buttons, it will then increment a share counter.

for FB, you can use this:
`<https://graph.facebook.com/?id=[YOUR> URL]`
buzzsumo also has a chrome plugin: <https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/buzzsumo/gedpbnanjmblcmlfhgfficjnglidndfo/related>
It would be great if you could share these resources/ideas in the Community thread as well for future users to find! :grinning:
Ill add them in there now on the post :slightly_smiling_face:
PS <@UE0QCBRPY> looks like buzzsumo offers this in their platfrom: <https://buzzsumo.com/solutions/content-discovery/>
